name: Bitcoin for Beginners
short-description: How To Grow Your Income And Generate Tremendous Profit Investing In Bitcoin
description:
Bitcoin disrupted the digital world when it was introduced to the public in 2009. After more than a decade, it continues to prove its value on the market and has sparked the birth of numerous cryptocurrencies vying to get close to its worldwide popularity.

In this book, you'll discover:
- What Bitcoin is and how it got started
- The value of Bitcoin
- Pros and Cons of using Bitcoin
- How to get Bitcoin
- If Bitcoin investing is for you?
- How to invest in Bitcoin safely
- The intricacies of banking with Bitcoin
- How Bitcoin transactions are created
- What factors affect Bitcoin prices
- ...and much, much more!

By the time you're through with this book, you'll be well equipped to make wise and informed decisions regarding your Bitcoin investments.
